languages.text: "Тот, кто обрывает чужие нити по собственному разумению, ставит свою волю превыше воли Неумирающего. И однажды шепот Его станет громом над их головами".

traits.locale_text: "Тот, кто обрывает чужие нити по собственному разумению, ставит свою волю превыше воли Неумирающего. И однажды шепот Его станет громом над их головами".

languages.text: "Anyone who severs people's threads as they see fit puts their intent above the will of the Undying Emperor. One day, His whisper will sound as thunder over their heads."
languages.original_text: "Тот, кто обрывает чужие нити по собственному разумению, ставит свою волю превыше воли Неумирающего. И однажды шепот Его станет громом над их головами".

traits.locale_text: "Anyone who severs people's threads as they see fit puts their intent above the will of the Undying Emperor. One day, His whisper will sound as thunder over their heads."
"Anyone who severs people's threads as they see fit puts their intent above the will of the Undying Emperor. One day, His whisper will sound as thunder over their heads."
"Anyone who severs people's threads as they see fit puts their intent above the will of the Undying Emperor. One day, His whisper will sound as thunder over their heads."
"Anyone who severs people's threads as they see fit puts their intent above the will of the Undying Emperor. One day, His whisper will sound as thunder over their heads."
"Anyone who severs people's threads as they see fit puts their intent above the will of the Undying Emperor. One day, His whisper will sound as thunder over their heads."
"Anyone who severs people's threads as they see fit puts their intent above the will of the Undying Emperor. One day, His whisper will sound as thunder over their heads."

languages.text: 「人の命の糸を己の思うままに断ち切る者は、不死の皇帝の意志よりも、自らの意図を上に置いている。やがていつの日か、皇帝の囁きが、彼らの頭上に雷鳴のごとく響き渡るだろう」
languages.original_text: "Anyone who severs people's threads as they see fit puts their intent above the will of the Undying Emperor. One day, His whisper will sound as thunder over their heads."

traits.locale_text: 「人の命の糸を己の思うままに断ち切る者は、不死の皇帝の意志よりも、自らの意図を上に置いている。やがていつの日か、皇帝の囁きが、彼らの頭上に雷鳴のごとく響き渡るだろう」

languages.text: "Wer nach Belieben Lebensfäden durchtrennt, stellt seine Absichten über den Willen des Todlosen Imperators. Eines Tages wird das Flüstern des Imperators wie Donner über seinem Kopf ertönen."
languages.original_text: "Anyone who severs people's threads as they see fit puts their intent above the will of the Undying Emperor. One day, His whisper will sound as thunder over their heads."

traits.locale_text: "Wer nach Belieben Lebensfäden durchtrennt, stellt seine Absichten über den Willen des Todlosen Imperators. Eines Tages wird das Flüstern des Imperators wie Donner über seinem Kopf ertönen."

languages.text: « Quiconque tranche les fils des autres comme bon lui semble accomplit ses desseins au mépris de la volonté de l'Empereur Immortel. Un jour, Ses murmures retentiront comme le tonnerre au-dessus de sa tête. »
languages.original_text: "Anyone who severs people's threads as they see fit puts their intent above the will of the Undying Emperor. One day, His whisper will sound as thunder over their heads."

traits.locale_text: « Quiconque tranche les fils des autres comme bon lui semble accomplit ses desseins au mépris de la volonté de l'Empereur Immortel. Un jour, Ses murmures retentiront comme le tonnerre au-dessus de sa tête. »

languages.text: «Cualquiera que corta los hilos de la gente atendiendo a sus caprichos antepone sus motivaciones a la voluntad del Emperador Inmortal. Algún día, Su susurro atronará sobre sus cabezas».
languages.original_text: "Anyone who severs people's threads as they see fit puts their intent above the will of the Undying Emperor. One day, His whisper will sound as thunder over their heads."

traits.locale_text: «Cualquiera que corta los hilos de la gente atendiendo a sus caprichos antepone sus motivaciones a la voluntad del Emperador Inmortal. Algún día, Su susurro atronará sobre sus cabezas».

languages.text: “那些自以为有权切断其他人丝线的罪人，试图将自己的意志凌驾于不死神皇的意志之上。终有一天，祂的低语会如同雷鸣一般，响彻那些罪人的头顶。”
languages.original_text: "Anyone who severs people's threads as they see fit puts their intent above the will of the Undying Emperor. One day, His whisper will sound as thunder over their heads."

traits.locale_text: “那些自以为有权切断其他人丝线的罪人，试图将自己的意志凌驾于不死神皇的意志之上。终有一天，祂的低语会如同雷鸣一般，响彻那些罪人的头顶。”

languages.text: "İnsanların hesaplarını kafalarına göre kesen her kimse, kendi menfaatini Ölmeyen İmparator'dan üstün görüyor demektir. Gün gelecek, O'nun fısıltıları dimağlarında yankılanacak."
languages.original_text: "Anyone who severs people's threads as they see fit puts their intent above the will of the Undying Emperor. One day, His whisper will sound as thunder over their heads."

traits.locale_text: "İnsanların hesaplarını kafalarına göre kesen her kimse, kendi menfaatini Ölmeyen İmparator'dan üstün görüyor demektir. Gün gelecek, O'nun fısıltıları dimağlarında yankılanacak."

languages.original_text: "Anyone who severs people's threads as they see fit puts their intent above the will of the Undying Emperor. One day, His whisper will sound as thunder over their heads."
